text: Passing --data-path explicitly keeps runtime aligned local blob folder.

title: Collections Dashboard
code: parse_cli <- function(argv, defaults) {   opts <- defaults   i <- 1L    next_value <- function(flag_name) {     if (i >= length(argv)) {       stop(sprintf("Missing value for %s", flag_name), call. = FALSE)     }     i <<- i + 1L     argv[[i]]   }    while (i <= length(argv)) {     token <- argv[[i]]      if (token %in% c("-h", "--help")) {       usage()       quit(save = "no", status = 0)     } else if (token %in% c("-p", "--port")) {       opts$port <- as.integer(next_value(token))     } else if (token == "--host") {       opts$host <- next_value(token)     } else if (token == "--data-path") {       opts$data_path <- next_value(token)     } else if (token == "--api-key") {       opts$api_key <- next_value(token)     } else if (token == "--collection") {       opts$collection <- next_value(token)     } else if (token == "--no-auth") {       opts$no_auth <- TRUE     } else if (token == "--launch-browser") {       opts$launch_browser <- TRUE     } else if (token == "--print-only") {       opts$print_only <- TRUE     } else if (token == "--no-dashboard") {       opts$dashboard <- FALSE     } else if (token == "--dashboard") {       opts$dashboard <- TRUE     } else {       stop(sprintf("Unknown option: %s", token), call. = FALSE)     }      i <- i + 1L   }    opts }

title: Collections Dashboard

title: Local Blob / Vector Database
text: functions product collections/create_collection.R control local blob writes:
code: collection_output_dir <- function(data_path) {   normalized <- normalizePath(data_path, winslash = "/", mustWork = FALSE)   if (tolower(basename(normalized)) == tolower(COLLECTION_NAME)) {     return(normalized)   }   file.path(normalized, COLLECTION_NAME) }  persist_collection_snapshot <- function(chunks, data_path) {   out_dir <- collection_output_dir(data_path)   if (!dir.exists(out_dir)) {     dir.create(out_dir, recursive = TRUE)   }    saveRDS(chunks, file.path(out_dir, "chunks.rds"))   out_dir }

title: Local Blob / Vector Database
code: update_collection_tags_at_path <- function(data_path) {   db_path <- file.path(data_path, "_vectrixdb.db")   if (!file.exists(db_path)) return(FALSE)   if (!requireNamespace("DBI", quietly = TRUE) || !requireNamespace("RSQLite", quietly = TRUE)) return(FALSE)    con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), db_path)   on.exit(DBI::dbDisconnect(con), add = TRUE)    row_count <- DBI::dbGetQuery(     con,     "SELECT COUNT(*) AS n FROM collections WHERE name = ?",     params = list(COLLECTION_NAME)   )$n[[1]]    if (is.null(row_count) || row_count == 0) return(FALSE)    tags_json <- make_tags_json(COLLECTION_TAGS)   DBI::dbExecute(     con,     "UPDATE collections SET tags = ?, description = ? WHERE name = ?",     params = list(tags_json, COLLECTION_DESCRIPTION, COLLECTION_NAME)   )   TRUE }

title: Product Collections
code: SCRIPT_DIR <- get_script_dir() DOCS_PATH <- file.path(SCRIPT_DIR, "products", "docs") BASE_DIR <- dirname(SCRIPT_DIR)  OUTPUT_PATHS <- c(   #file.path(BASE_DIR, "05_agent registry", "backend", "data", "products"),   file.path(BASE_DIR, "local_blob", "vector database") )  COLLECTION_NAME <- "bmo_products" COLLECTION_TAGS <- c("graph", "EN") COLLECTION_TIER <- "graph" COLLECTION_LANGUAGE <- "en" VECTOR_DIMENSION <- 384  CHUNK_SIZE <- 800 CHUNK_OVERLAP <- 100

title: Product Collections
code:
chunk_markdown <- function(content, doc_title, chunk_size = CHUNK_SIZE, overlap = CHUNK_OVERLAP) {   chunks <- list()   sections <- strsplit(content, "
(?=## )", perl = TRUE)[[1]]    for (section in sections) {     section <- trimws(section)     if (nchar(section) == 0) next      lines <- strsplit(section, "
")[[1]]     first_line <- lines[1]      if (startsWith(first_line, "## ")) {       section_title <- gsub("^## ", "", first_line)     } else if (startsWith(first_line, "# ")) {       section_title <- gsub("^# ", "", first_line)     } else {       section_title <- "Overview"     }      if (nchar(section) <= chunk_size) {       chunk_text <- sprintf("Document: %s
Section: %s

%s", doc_title, section_title, section)       chunks[[length(chunks) + 1]] <- list(text = chunk_text, section = section_title)       next     }      subsections <- strsplit(section, "
(?=### )", perl = TRUE)[[1]]     for (subsection in subsections) {       subsection <- trimws(subsection)       if (nchar(subsection) == 0) next       # (remaining paragraph split + overlap logic unchanged)     }   }    chunks }

title: Product Collections
text: Collection write path insert logic excerpt:
code: create_collection_at_path <- function(chunks, data_path, clear = FALSE) {   if (!dir.exists(data_path)) {     dir.create(data_path, recursive = TRUE)   }    db <- getExportedValue("VectrixDB", "Vectrix")$new(     name = COLLECTION_NAME,     path = data_path,     dimension = VECTOR_DIMENSION,     tier = COLLECTION_TIER,     language = COLLECTION_LANGUAGE   )    existing_count <- db$count()   if (clear && existing_count > 0) {     db$clear()   }    texts <- sapply(chunks, function(c) c$text)   metadata <- lapply(chunks, function(c) c$metadata)   ids <- sapply(chunks, function(c) c$id)    db$add(texts = texts, metadata = metadata, ids = ids)   db }

title: Product Collections
code: main <- function(clear = FALSE, update_tags = FALSE) {   chunks <- read_and_chunk_documents(DOCS_PATH)   databases <- create_collection(chunks, clear = clear)    if (length(databases) > 0) {     test_search(databases[[1]])   }    invisible(databases) }  if (sys.nframe() == 0) {   args <- commandArgs(trailingOnly = TRUE)   clear <- "--clear" %in% args   update_tags <- "--update-tags" %in% args   main(clear = clear, update_tags = update_tags) }

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
text: Zero config. Text , results . Pure R - Python required. VectrixDB lightweight, pure R vector database built-text embeddings. external dependencies, API keys, Python - just install use.

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: # Install from GitHub devtools::install_github("knowusuboaky/vectrixdb-r")  # Required dependencies install.packages(c("R6", "text2vec", "digest", "Matrix"))  # Optional for better performance install.packages(c("RcppAnnoy", "word2vec", "stopwords"))

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: library(VectrixDB)  # Create and add - ONE LINE db <- Vectrix$new("my_docs")$add(c("Python is great", "Machine learning is fun", "R is awesome"))  # Search - ONE LINE results <- db$search("programming")  # Get top result print(results$top()$text) #> "R is awesome"

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
text: Unlike vector databases, VectrixDB 100% R: - TF-IDF embeddings - Built-, works box - BM25 search - Using text2vec - Optional word vectors - Load GloVe word2vec files - ANN indexing - Fast search RcppAnnoy

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: # Dense (semantic) search using TF-IDF/word vectors results <- db$search("query", mode = "dense")  # Sparse (keyword/BM25) search results <- db$search("query", mode = "sparse")  # Hybrid (dense + sparse with RRF fusion) results <- db$search("query", mode = "hybrid")  # Ultimate (hybrid + reranking) results <- db$search("query", mode = "ultimate")

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: # Default: TF-IDF (no external files needed) db <- Vectrix$new("docs")  # With GloVe word vectors (download from Stanford NLP) db <- Vectrix$new("docs", model = "glove", model_path = "glove.6B.100d.txt")  # With word2vec (download or train your own) db <- Vectrix$new("docs", model = "word2vec", model_path = "GoogleNews-vectors.bin")  # Custom embedding function my_embed <- function(texts) {   # Your custom logic   matrix(rnorm(length(texts) * 100), nrow = length(texts)) } db <- Vectrix$new("docs", embed_fn = my_embed, dimension = 100)

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: # Add with metadata db$add(   texts = c("Python guide", "ML tutorial", "R handbook"),   metadata = list(     list(category = "programming", year = 2024),     list(category = "ai", year = 2024),     list(category = "programming", year = 2023)   ) )  # Search with filter results <- db$search("guide", filter = list(category = "programming"))

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: # MMR for diversity results <- db$search("AI", rerank = "mmr", diversity = 0.7)  # Cross-encoder style reranking results <- db$search("AI", rerank = "cross-encoder")

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: results <- db$search("query")  # Access results results$top()          # Get top result results$texts()        # All result texts as vector results$ids()          # All result IDs results$scores()       # All scores results$length()       # Number of results results$get(2)         # Get second result  # Iterate results$foreach(function(r) {   cat(sprintf("%s: %.3f\n", r$id, r$score)) })

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
code: # Create database vdb <- VectrixDB$new("./my_data")  # Create collection with custom dimension collection <- vdb$create_collection("docs", dimension = 100)  # Add vectors directly collection$add(   ids = c("doc1", "doc2"),   vectors = matrix(rnorm(200), nrow = 2),   metadata = list(list(a = 1), list(a = 2)),   texts = c("First doc", "Second doc") )  # Search results <- collection$search(query_vector, limit = 10)  # Hybrid search results <- collection$hybrid_search(   query = query_vector,   query_text = "search terms",   limit = 10 )

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
text: Use RcppAnnoy large collections - Automatically enabled 100+ docs Pre-train embeddings - Fit embedder corpus Use word vectors - GloVe/word2vec provides better semantic search TF-IDF
code: # Pre-train for better embeddings db <- Vectrix$new("docs") # Add your corpus - TF-IDF will fit automatically db$add(large_corpus) # Now searches will use the fitted vocabulary

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
text: R version prioritizes simplicity R-native tools. neural embeddings, use Python version provide custom embed_fn.

title: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models
text: Required: - R6 - OOP classes - text2vec - TF-IDF, BM25, vocabulary - digest - ID generation - Matrix - Sparse matrices Optional: - RcppAnnoy - Fast ANN search - word2vec - Load word2vec models - stopwords - Remove stopwords - RSQLite, DBI - Persistent storage - plumber - REST API

title: VectrixDB Easy API - The Simplest Vector Database — Vectrix
text: name Collection name path Storage path (default: ./vectrixdb_data) model Embedding model: "tfidf" (default), "glove-50", "glove-100", "glove-200", "glove-300", "word2vec" dimension Vector dimension (auto-detected GloVe) embed_fn Custom embedding function: fn(texts) -> matrix model_path Path pre-trained word vectors (GloVe .txt word2vec .bin) language Language behavior: "en" (English-focused) "ml" (multilingual/Unicode) tier Storage tier: "dense", "hybrid", "ultimate", "graph" auto_download Automatically download GloVe vectors needed (default: TRUE)

title: VectrixDB Easy API - The Simplest Vector Database — Vectrix
code: \dontrun{ # Default TF-IDF embeddings (no external files needed) db <- Vectrix$new("docs")  # With GloVe 100d word vectors (auto-downloads ~130MB) db <- Vectrix$new("docs", model = "glove-100")  # With pre-downloaded GloVe db <- Vectrix$new("docs", model_path = "path/to/glove.6B.100d.txt")  # Custom embedding function db <- Vectrix$new("docs", embed_fn = my_embed_function, dimension = 768) }

code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Create and add - ONE LINE db <- Vectrix$new("my_docs")$add(c("Python is great", "Machine learning is fun"))  # Search - ONE LINE results <- db$search("programming")  # Full power - STILL ONE LINE results <- db$search("AI", mode = "ultimate")  # dense + sparse + rerank } # }   ## ------------------------------------------------ ## Method `Vectrix$new` ## ------------------------------------------------  if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Default TF-IDF embeddings (no external files needed) db <- Vectrix$new("docs")  # With GloVe 100d word vectors (auto-downloads ~130MB) db <- Vectrix$new("docs", model = "glove-100")  # With pre-downloaded GloVe db <- Vectrix$new("docs", model_path = "path/to/glove.6B.100d.txt")  # Custom embedding function db <- Vectrix$new("docs", embed_fn = my_embed_function, dimension = 768) } # }  ## ------------------------------------------------ ## Method `Vectrix$add` ## ------------------------------------------------  if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ db$add(c("text 1", "text 2")) db$add("another text", metadata = list(source = "web")) } # }  ## ------------------------------------------------ ## Method `Vectrix$search` ## ------------------------------------------------  if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ results <- db$search("python programming") results <- db$search("AI", mode = "ultimate", rerank = "mmr") print(results$top()$text) } # }

what: VectrixDB: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models — VectrixDB-package
title: VectrixDB: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models — VectrixDB-package
text: lightweight, visual-first vector database embedded ML models requiring API keys. Features unique 4-tier search system (dense, hybrid, ultimate, graph-based), GraphRAG knowledge graphs, faceted search ACL security, HNSW approximate nearest neighbor indexing, caching layer, CLI tools, built-Shiny dashboard. Simplifies vector database operations zero configuration - text , results . VectrixDB lightweight, visual-first vector database embedded ML models requiring API keys. Features unique 4-tier search system (dense, hybrid, ultimate, graph-based) built-dashboard.

title: VectrixDB: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models — VectrixDB-package
text: Vectrix - Simple API text-, results-workflow VectrixDB - Advanced database interface Collection - Vector collection management vectrix_serve - Start REST API server

title: VectrixDB: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models — VectrixDB-package
text: dense - Semantic vector search sparse - BM25 keyword search hybrid - Combined dense + sparse ultimate - Full pipeline reranking neural - ColBERT + cross-encoder

title: VectrixDB: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models — VectrixDB-package
text: Maintainer: Kwadwo Daddy Nyame Owusu Boakye kwadwo.owusuboakye@outlook.com

title: VectrixDB: Lightweight Visual-First Vector Database with Embedded ML Models — VectrixDB-package

text: Native GraphRAG implementation VectrixDB Features: Entity relationship extraction Hierarchical community detection Local, global, hybrid search strategies Incremental graph updates

title: VectrixDB HNSW Index — hnsw
text: Hierarchical Navigable Small World graph fast approximate nearest neighbor search Uses RcppAnnoy high-performance ANN search. Falls back brute-force search RcppAnnoy available.

title: Launch VectrixDB Dashboard — vdb_dashboard
text: Start VectrixDB API server mount HTML dashboard /dashboard.

title: Launch VectrixDB Dashboard — vdb_dashboard
code: vdb_dashboard(   db = NULL,   data_path = "./vectrixdb_data",   port = 7377,   host = "127.0.0.1",   launch.browser = TRUE,   api_key = NULL )

title: Launch VectrixDB Dashboard — vdb_dashboard
text: db Optional Vectrix object. data_path Path vector database directory. port Port number (default: 7377). host Host address (default: "127.0.0.1"). launch.browser Whether open browser start. api_key Optional API key authenticated write operations.

title: Launch Simple Dashboard — vdb_dashboard_simple
text: Convenience wrapper around vdb_dashboard() using db$path.
